title: 86/426/EEC: Commission Decision of 31 July 1986 approving an adjustment to the special programme submitted for the region of Marche for the adaptation and modernization of the structure of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81, as amended (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 31 July 1986
approving an adjustment to the special programme submitted for the region of Marche for the adaptation and modernization of the structure of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81, as amended
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(86/426/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The adjustment to the special programme for the region of Marche relating to the adaptation and modernization of the structure of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, forwarded by the Italian Government on 11 April 1986 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 27.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 213, 9. 8. 1984, p. 37.
